product_name: Benefit CosmeticsThe POREfessional Pore Minimizing Primer
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingBenefit Cosmetics The POREfessional Pore Minimizing Face Primer minimizes the appearance of pores & fine lines for smoother-than-smooth skin. The translucent formula complements all skintones and helps makeup stay put.
details: DetailsBenefitsMatte finishTranslucent formulaAvailable in full-size and miniKey IngredientsContains a Vitamin E derivativeFeatures97% said skin looked smooth*91% said it minimized pore appearance*93% said it helped makeup stay put**Self-evaluation by 100 women over 1 weekItem 2250196How To UseTo use under makeup: Apply to clean, lightly moisturized skin. Pat on problem areas & blend with fingertips.To use over makeup: Pat on lightly over makeup & blend.Prime in the AM: Apply a thin layer of this PRO balm to clean, lightly moisturized skin. Pat lightly from the center of the face outward with fingertips. Wait seconds, then apply makeup as usual. Skin appears smooth & even...isn't that what we're all looking for?Apply whenever pores come out of hiding: If pores reappear, pat delicately on T-zone over makeup & blend. Remember, just a dab'll do ya!BEAUTY TIP: Apply a thin layer of Benefit's POREfessional Face Primer to clean, moisturized skin. Next, smooth on Benefit's Boi-ing Cakeless Full Coverage Liquid Concealer starting at the outer areas of the nose, moving downward toward the jawline. To avoid cakiness, don't lay it on thick! Finish with Benefit's Hoola Bronzer for complexion perfection!IngredientsCyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Isononyl Isononanoate, Silica, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Isododecane, Phenoxyethanol, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Cyclohexasiloxane, Tocopheryl Acetate, Fragrance (Parfum), Mica, Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Limonene, Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Triethoxycaprylylsilane, BHT.Product ingredient listings are updated periodically. Before using a Benefit product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: To use under makeup: Apply to clean, lightly moisturized skin. Pat on problem areas & blend with fingertips.To use over makeup: Pat on lightly over makeup & blend.Prime in the AM: Apply a thin layer of this PRO balm to clean, lightly moisturized skin. Pat lightly from the center of the face outward with fingertips. Wait seconds, then apply makeup as usual. Skin appears smooth & even...isn't that what we're all looking for?Apply whenever pores come out of hiding: If pores reappear, pat delicately on T-zone over makeup & blend. Remember, just a dab'll do ya!BEAUTY TIP: Apply a thin layer of Benefit's POREfessional Face Primer to clean, moisturized skin. Next, smooth on Benefit's Boi-ing Cakeless Full Coverage Liquid Concealer starting at the outer areas of the nose, moving downward toward the jawline. To avoid cakiness, don't lay it on thick! Finish with Benefit's Hoola Bronzer for complexion perfection!
ingredients: BHT.Product ingredient listings are updated periodically. Before using a Benefit product
please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use

reviews.headline: Not just for pores
reviews.comments: This also minimizes my fine lines in addition to my pores!!! Love it!

reviews.headline: Great for minimizing pores.
reviews.comments: I've used this product for several years.  It glides on smoothly and works great!

reviews.headline: Didn't give me the smooth base
reviews.comments: Thought it would do more to help my foundation go on nicer.

reviews.headline: Poor results
reviews.comments: I could tell no difference after using this product.

reviews.headline: Original is better
reviews.comments: This product is okay. I like the original pore minimizer better.

reviews.headline: Product is good just don't buy at ULTA!
reviews.comments: The promotion was buy one get 2, so I did opt for ulta instead of other vendors. Guess what? Product arrived as one only. I checked on my purchase and second item was marked as cancelled (not by me), I reached out to customer service and the answer was: order another one and we offer free shipping. Great scam! No thank you Ulta. Terrible experience

reviews.headline: Fast easy and works !!
reviews.comments: It works well ‚Ä¶ fills in the pores and other small holes on your face ‚Ä¶ ‚ù§Ô∏èü§ó

reviews.headline: Love this product for priming or alone
reviews.comments: This product was recommended by Ulta professional and was perfect for me.You can use light application just in needed zones,or all over to create a flawless base before makeup.I have a lot of pores now and it's amazing how this just smooth my face.

Wish I could give this primer 10 stars. I've been using it for years and have tried many others that don't come close to the powers of this product! It blurs, mattefies, and provides the perfect base for makeup to stay all day. I have combination oily skin and it is the only primer I've ever tried that goes on and stays matte.

reviews.headline: I love, love, love this product!
reviews.comments: I bought the small one for my 13 yo daughter and now she wants the full size!  So smooth and even. NO oily feel and other products go over it easily.

reviews.headline: Tinted Benefit Pore Primer
reviews.comments: Great light coverage option when I'm somewhat tan and mostly when at home & weekends when there isnt anything to get dressed up for. Feels great and doesnt cake. Can also use under foundation. I do feel like its a little pricey for the amount you get since you can get a full size prestige foundation for around the same cost.

reviews.headline: Great product !
reviews.comments:
Ive been buying this product for years !

Great product !

reviews.headline: Fav primer
reviews.comments: Love how makeup looks after use

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Love this product. Goes on smooth and looks and feels great.

reviews.headline: Would not buy
reviews.comments: Did not work

reviews.headline: Fantastic product!!
reviews.comments: I would buy this over and over again.  I love the coverage!

reviews.headline: trash
reviews.comments: More like a cream than a primer, no stick to it, does not help with pores

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: Not only does it minimize pores to a smooth finish, it also helps with any wrinkles. I used i on the deep line between my eyebrows and it works wonders. I haven't found another product with the same results.

reviews.headline: 2nd time purchased
reviews.comments: Glides on and us so smooth

reviews.headline: Smooth start.
reviews.comments: This makes my base layer so smooth. You almost wouldn't know I'm a relic.

faceoff_positive.comments: I'm a huge benefit gal...and yet was still a little skeptical about this one, because I wasn't sure it would make that much of a difference. Wow, was I impressed. It wasn't so much minimizing my pores as it was taking away all the oily shine from my face and allowing my makeup to stand out more! So excited that I have it in time for my wedding in 11 days! :)
faceoff_positive.headline: I'm a huge benefit gal...and yet was still a little...

faceoff_negative.comments:
Don't get me wrong, I love Benefit. Who doesn't love the darling vintage illustrations, quirky packaging, and cute names, but I have to say I'm disappointed with the Porefessional Primer.
Pros: 1. It makes your skin smooth and matte, 2. it's packaged nicely, and 3. it makes your makeup stay longer: it creates a barrier between your skin and your makeup.
Cons: 1. It smells gross, 2. it didn't make my pores appear any smaller (and I don't have abnormally small or large pores), 3. very pricey, especially when there are primers that work better at its intended purpose, 4. it felt thick on my skin, even in the recommended pea size amount, and 5. it's so little product for the price, my bottle came unopened but I swear only half of the container was full.
So in my experience, yes it works as a basic primer, but it didn't live up to the description of the product, and I'd much rather buy a drugstore primer that reduces the size of my pores, makes my skin matte, reduces redness, lasts longer, and doesn't feel quite so heavy or have an odor.
faceoff_negative.headline: More Like Poor-fessional
